Title: Insecurity: Avoid non-essential travel to Nigeria, Canada warns citizens
Summary: The Government of Canada has issued an updated travel advisory urging its citizens to avoid non-essential travel to Nigeria, citing persistent security challenges across the country .

Title: Firm to set up $3.5m poultry farm in Katsina
Summary: TORQ Agro is to set up a $3.5 million, or approximately N5 billion, integrated poultry farm and hatchery facility in Katsina State . The project would be located on a 10-hectare plot of land .

Title: Abiodun extols Olubadan’s contributions to nation-building
Summary: Ogun State Governor, Dapo Abiodun, has lauded the Olubadan of Ibadanland, Oba Rasheed AdewoluLadoja, for his profound contributions to nation-building .

Title: Insecurity triggers rare APC dissent in Reps amid fresh Kwara, Kano attacks
Summary: Nigeria’s worsening security crisis triggered rare open dissent in the House of Representatives yesterday, when All Progressives Congress (APC) lawmaker expressed concern . Insecurity triggers rare APC dissent in Reps amid fresh Kwara, Kano attacks .

Title: Dangote partners Honeywell Int’l on refinery expansion, 1.4mbpd 2028 target
Summary: Dangote Group partners Honeywell Int’l on refinery expansion, 1.4mbpd 2028 target . Dagote Group has announced its strategic partnership with Honeywell International Inc. to support the next phase of expansion of the Dangotes refinery .

Title: Insecurity: Police, security agencies re-activate ‘Operation Sweep FCT’
Summary: The Federal Capital Territory (FCT) Police Command has re-activated the joint security task force known as Operation Sweep FCT . The FCT Police Command is working in collaboration with multiple security agencies .

Title: Why security agencies can’t bomb bandit enclaves — Presidency
Summary: Security agencies are fully aware of the identities and locations of the bandit groups responsible for recent mass abductions . The Special Adviser to President Bola Tinubu on Information and Strategy, Bayo Onanuga, has disclosed .

Title: Naira depreciates to N1,474/$ in parallel market
Summary: The Naira depreciated to N1,474 per dollar in the parallel market from N1.465 per dollar on Monday . The naira appreciated to N1,441 per dollar at the Nigerian Foreign Exchange Market (NFEM) Data published by the Central Bank of Nigeria, CBN, showed that the exchange

Title: Alleged murder: Chidinma cross examined, says she regrets Ataga’s death
Summary: A defendant, Chidinma Ojukwu, told a Lagos High Court in Tafawa Balewa Square, that she regrets the death of Super TV Chief Executive Officer, Michael Ataga . The defendant is standing trial alongside her sister, Chioma Egbuchu, and one Adedapo Quadri,

Title: Abductions: Tinubu orders 24-hour aerial surveillance on Kwara, Kebbi, Niger forest
Summary: Tinubu orders 24-hour security cordon around forests in Kwara, Kebbi and Niger states . The cordon follows a surge in kidnappings and terrorist activities .

Three Delta youths killed as police hunt chief, suspects
FG seals two Ogun factories over safety breaches
